attributes.description: At United Motors Secunda, we learn from the past, build on the present and anticipate the future. United Motors Secunda we always pursue perfection so that every customer can live fully by making the most of every moment and opportunity while shopping for the perfect commuter on our Pre owned floor. At United Motors Secunda we promise; nationwide delivery, Trade Ins welcomed and please have peace of mind knowing that every vehicle is subject to a Check List. Speak to our Finance department for tailored financial packages to suit your needs.

DEMO MAZDA CX5 2.0 DYNAMIC A/M 2022 FOR SALE AT MAZDA CENTURION IN PRETORIA.

FEATURES Include: 6 Airbags, Aircon, 17" Alloy Wheels, Auto Head Lights, Auto Wipers, Climate Control, Cruise Control, Driver Electric Seat, Leather Interior, Car play Navigation, Radio/CD/Mp3 with AUX & USB Port, Bluetooth, Reverse Camera, Xenon Lights. 

Price excludes delivery and registration fees.

Immaculate Condition. Swift Finance Can Be Arranged. Trade Ins Of Good Condition Accepted.
